lyrics:
Whatcha See Is Whatcha Get Lyrics[Verse 1]
Hey, some people are made of plastic
And you know some people are made of wood
Some people have hearts of stone
Some people are up to no good

But baby, I'm for real
I'm as real as real can get
If what you're looking for is real lovin'
Then what you see is what you get

[Chorus]
Whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get (is whatcha get)
Whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get (is whatcha get)
I said, whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get now, baby (is whatcha get)
And the real thing is the best thing yet (the best thing yet)
[Verse 2]
(You know) Some people are made of lies
To bring you down and shame your name
But baby, I have good intentions
'Cause breaking hearts just ain't my game

All I want to do is love you
And sugar, I won't fill you with regret, no, no
If what you're looking for is real lovin' (real lovin')
Then what you see is what you get

[Chorus]
Whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get (is whatcha get). (Look at me)
Whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get (is whatcha get)
I mean, what you see (what you see) is what you get now, baby (is what you get)
And the real, real thing is the best thing yet (the best thing yet). Oh!

[Bridge]
(Whatcha see) (Is whatcha get)
(I got a real love) (Come and get it)
(You can have it all)
(You know)

[Outro]
Whatcha see, baby, baby (Whatcha see) is whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
Look at me. Now whatcha see (whatcha see) is whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
I got to say it now (Baby, baby), whatcha see (Whatcha see) is whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
Every day now, whatcha see (Whatcha see) will be whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
I got to say whatcha see, baby, baby (Whatcha see), is whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
I got a real love, whatcha see (Whatcha see) will be whatcha get (Is whatcha get)
Look at me, look at me, look at me, look at me (Whatcha see): It's whatcha get (Is whatcha get)4Embed
